text: Hello, how are you?
hi how are you?
I am fine, are you interested in donating?
not currently, you?
I am, actually since I've started working on MTurk I could donate through few HITs
I am new to this and do it to earn extra money for living expenses
I see, I usually donate part or whole of my bonus. Sometimes It does not even hurt the reward anyway. I also have soft heart for children so I donate to children's charity
it did not state what we would be donating any portion of the bonus to, I am not uncharitable but I do like to know what I am donating to.
Actually this HIT is about the charity "Save the Children" they fight with children\'s hunger and disease in 120 countries
oh wow, that sounds worthwhile.  How much are you donating?

I am not specific to donate. I mean I donated $0.50 and $1 before, I will be donating almost same amount this time too. I actually visited its website before, on website there is a minimum for donating, but here anything is possible
I see, so what do we do now?
I can give you a little information about this charity. I am also able to share its website. Their clear financial report made me trust
I think in this arena, we are just supposed to agree upon an amount between $0 - $2 for each of our donation.
Yes, but to be honest if they were not clear and if they did not cooperate with well-known companies I could not trust
agreed, I liked to be informed about organizations before I donate to any of them, especially ones that misappropriate funds
I know right. I like donate to make a change, a little amount can actually help if it will be used correctly
and lots of little amounts add up to big amounts as well
yes, exactly. thanks for your time and attention. have a nice day. it is the link you can get more information:  URL
ok great thanks for the info!  Have a great week!
